TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WSTrustChannel extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject, class System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustChannelContract, class System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustContract

summary.span: WS-Trust 메시지를 STS(보안 토큰 서비스)로 전송하는 데 사용되는 채널을 나타냅니다.

span.span: Represents a channel that is used to send WS-Trust messages to a security token service (STS).

MemberSignature.Value: public WSTrustChannel (System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustChannelFactory factory, System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustChannelContract inner, System.ServiceModel.Security.TrustVersion trustVersion, System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext context, System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustRequestSerializer requestSerializer, System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustResponseSerializer responseSerializer);
